## Carry Recipe
_Semi Front Wrap Cross Carry – Base Size Minus 3 – Torso Pass + Cross Pass_

- Tuck one tail in pocket or pants
- Other tail goes around belly, back, belly again for a Torso Pass
- Cross back and over opposite shoulder
- Baby goes in pocket
- Cross Pass with tails
- Tie off with Slip Knot
